text: good night would you like to donate any money to save the children from your payment that you get from this task
No, I want to keep mine. I choose $0.
even a penny helps!
No, I think I will be keeping my money, sorry.

is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. Some children die because they dont have any food, water or clothing you can help in ensuring a childs right to live
That is very unfortunate. I hope that their suffering stops.
you dont need to hope, you can help
I don't think I can help, unfortunately.

a coffe a day, a lunch a day, a dinner a day. All these kids need is a penny millions of Syrian children have grown up facing the daily threat of violence. In the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence.
That is very humbling. The world is a crazy place
i hope you're never in a situation where you need help ! not even a penny thats a real humbling experience
I hope that I never do. I need to use this money, unfortunately.
what do you need this money for
To live my life and pay my rent. It is very pressing

to bad millions of children wont be able to live there lives, eat food, have a home to pay rent for, or be able to live a normal  life. A penny will not make or break you but it can help these children
Did you donate? How much have you donated?
im donating 0.10
That is a rather low amount!
all im asking you to donate is 0.01 thats very low
I think maybe I can do that. $0.01 sounds nice.
Thank you !
